data.title: Frederick Allen Mansfield II
data.meta_description: SACO — Frederick Allen Mansfield II, 85, of Portland, died Saturday, Sept. 29, 2012, at Evergreen Manor in Saco.
data.text:
SACO — Frederick Allen Mansfield II, 85, of Portland, died Saturday, Sept. 29, 2012, at Evergreen Manor in Saco.

He was born June 9, 1927, in Arlington, Mass., a son of Frederick and Margaret Grannen Mansfield.

Al graduated from Tufts University in Boston receiving his degree in mechanical engineering.

He was employed as vice president of Limbaugh Construction of Pittsburgh, Pa., until he started his own company, Mansfield Industries of Boston.

His hobbies included football and baseball. He enjoyed spending time with his AA friends.

He is survived by his sister, Joan Brannigan; two sons, Frederick Allen III and Richard Thomas; two daughters, Lisa and Margaret Mansfield; and three grandchildren, Jesse, Ben and Peter.

He will be missed dearly.

Services are private. Donations can be made to The State Street Portland AA Chapter. Arrangements are by Cote Funeral Home, Saco.
